attributes.action: To grant single working people assistance in the first time purchase of houses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Single working people of all ages shoulder a large burden in taxation.

Working families & couples get assistance in many ways. Family tax credits, housing benefits, chidcare assistance etc.

I am not against this.

However, this forces many single working people into renting accomodation, often throughout their working lives.

The assistance could be in the form of a one off grant or through tax breaks.

It would create a healthier first time buying market as well.
